description: Trait that captures the need to attribute ownership or authorship to content.
title: Credit trait

___credits.description: An array of people/groups attributed to this content.

$eref.description: Models attribution to an individual or group for contribution towards some content item.
$eref.title: Credit for a piece of content.

___org.description: The (optional) organization the contributor belongs to.

___role.description: The role the contributor played in the content.
